relation.text: left Calais , & tho ' his Cough is certainly leſs frequent & his Pulse better -- his great thinneſs & Looks are very alarming -- not only to me , & to my anxious Eyes -- but to all around me -- He has had a good Night , but he is heavy , & now
tell you our Dr : Boy has been better those 2 last Days
hope in a Day or two
